metadata.title: Logic Apps Custom Connector - ForcepointSMC NGFW
metadata.description: ForcepointSMC Connector performs API actions on the Forcepoint NGFW (Next Generation Firewall).
prerequisites: 1. Forcepoint SMC service endpoint should be known. (e.g.  https://forcepointdomain:PortNumber/})

metadata.description: Enter the name for SMC Connector without spaces
Enter the ForcepointSMC Service EndPoint as 'https://{forcepointDomainname}:{portnumber}/'

post.description: Logs in to the Forcepoint SMC server

get.description: Searches for security policy by policy name in firewall

put.description: Logs out of Forcepoint SMC server.

delete.summary: Delete Policy Rule by IP or URL
delete.description: Deletes security rule if IP or URL is unblocked.

get.description: Gets list of all IPs if filter is empty or Gets list of IPs by filter value.

post.description: Creates IP list to add IP address.

post.summary: Add IP Address into IP List
post.description: Adds IP address to IP list.

get.summary: Get Policy Rule by IP or URL
get.description: Filters IP or URL from security policy rule.

post.description: Unlocks the policy if it is locked by admin user.

delete.description: Deletes the IP address from SMC.

get.description: Gets list of all URLs if filter is empty or Gets list of URLs by filter value

post.summary: Upload Policy After Adding IP or URL
post.description: Uploads the policy after adding IP or URL into policy.
Creates policy rule for any IP or URL sources.

items.description: Please enter action to be taken
items.title: Action

get.description: Gets complete policy details by rule name.

parameters.name: Rule Key
parameters.description: Please enter policy rule key value

get.summary: Find IP or URL in SMC
get.description: Searches IP or URL in Forcepoint SMC

parameters.name: flatten
parameters.description: Please select flatten type if we want to get reference

get.summary: Get IP address from IP List
get.description: If we want get all IP address from IP list then we can use this action

parameters.name: Ip list  element key
parameters.description: Please enter IP list element key value

get.description: This action will get URL from URL list

put.description: This action will upload URL to URL list

get.description: This action will get hosts by Ip address or list of IP address

parameters.name: flatten
parameters.description: Please select true if we want to get references in SMC
